chemoreception.notes: Corals are known to use chemoreception for feeding and other life processes. Specific details for Merulinidae are not available in the given context, but the trait is inferred.

mechanoreception.notes: Corals can sense water flow and physical contact, though the exact mechanisms are not detailed in the context. This allows them to react to changes in their environment.
